name: Witchy Watchy
description:
A Simple Top Down Shooter. Gameplay:

Kill all the monsters and take their souls to open the portal, but one shall find the portal to go beyond.

Controls

Keyboard & Mouse:

  • Move: WASD.

  • Fire: LeftMouseButton, Mouse Cursor for direction.

Gamepad:

  • Not Playable with gamepad.

Credits:
  • Witch Sprite: https://9e0.itch.io/witches-pack 
  •  Slime Sprite: https://rvros.itch.io/pixel-art-animated-slime 
  •  GUI: https://mounirtohami.itch.io/pixel-art-gui-elements
  • Fireball Sprite: https://nyknck.itch.io/pixelarteffectfx017 
  •  TileSet: https://angrysnail.itch.io/pixel-art-graveyard-tileset 
  •  BoD (Bringer of Death Boss) Sprite: https://clembod.itch.io/bringer-of-death-free 
  • BoD Boss Theme: Zef Parisoto - Electronic, Pop & Game Music on Youtube.
  • Skeleton Sprite: https://sanctumpixel.itch.io/sword-skeleton-pixel-art-character 
  •  Fireball sound: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/fire-magic-6947/ 
  •  UI sound: https://ellr.itch.io/universal-ui-soundpack
  • Blue Flame Sprite: https://pedrofmra.itch.io/blue-flame-character
